mapper.select: SELECT channel2.channel_code,channel2.channel_name,channel2.channel_nature,channel2.channel_type,channel2.access_platform, channel2.bank_card_type,channel2.logo,channel2.low_limit,channel2.high_limit,adapt2.sort FROM (SELECT adapt.channel_id, adapt.sort FROM t_pay_channel_adapt adapt WHERE adapt.app_id=#{appId} AND adapt.status = 1) adapt2 INNER JOIN (SELECT channel.id,channel.channel_code,channel.channel_name,channel.channel_nature,channel.channel_type,channel.access_platform, channel.bank_card_type,channel.logo,channel.low_limit,channel.high_limit FROM t_pay_channel_info channel WHERE channel.access_platform = #{accessPlatform} OR channel.access_platform = 4) channel2 ON adapt2.channel_id = channel2.id ORDER BY sort
